name: Run Jump Die Repeat
description:
Run Jump Die Repeat is a single button platformer game. Press SPACE to run, bounce, jump, climb, and kill as you attempt to save the Cracker Princess and escape the evil Cron Rebels home planet.

Featuring:

  • 50 increasingly challenging levels
  • 3 different game modes to play (story, classic, hardcore)
  • Simple yet engaging story mode
  • One button controls you'll have to learn to master
  • Death.. lots of deaths x_x
